ygData.subject: RE: Talies Reborn
ygData.msgSnippet: I was meaning more the new mana song at 20, exp penalty on hybrids rollback, and the song fixes that have been put in. (Lullaby is fixed now isn t it?) Should
ygData.messageBody:
I was meaning more the new mana song at 20, exp penalty on hybrids
rollback, and the song fixes that have been put in. (Lullaby is fixed now
isn't it?) Should have more options now than when we all started at release,
more places to hunt, more people hopefully appreciate a bard, etc. I see
groups looking for bards alot around mid teens in Lake Of Ill Omen where my
cleric currently is. She went from one bubble to 17 to 2 bubbles into 19 in
a few hours out there with just her and a rogue, same level. Of all the
things V does so wrong, I have to give them credit for doing a good job on
the zone size / spawn rate in zones like Ill Omen. There were 128 people in
the zone yesterday and we still had all we could pull.
General Interest Question: On Xegony, Greater Faydark is commonly known as
Faymart, where you can find any of your shopping needs. Is this the same on
other servers?

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
